Body: I have a QMobile A100 with Android 2.2.1 (which is very old). I want to upgrade it to the new version (2.3 Gingerbread). In Settings > About phone it shows that there are no updates to the firmware.How should I update my device? It is not a popular phone and I cannot find an updated ROM for it.If it matters, the phone has a 500 MHz CPU, 200 MB RAM with 250 MB ROM.
Title: Update Android on non famous manufacture Android Phone

history.Text: I have Qmobile A100 with Android 2.2.1 (which is very old). I want to upgrade it to new version(2.3 gingerbread). It has 500Mhz Cpu, 200 MB Ram with 250 MB ROM. Please advice from where and how should i update my Qmobile because Qmobile is not famous and no such rom is released for qmobile.How should i upgrade? On setting, about phone it shows phone is latest.Please advice...Thanks & Regards,tayyab
Update Android on non famous manufacture Android Phone

history.Text: I have a [QMobile A100][1] with Android 2.2.1 (which is very old). I want to upgrade it to the new version (2.3 Gingerbread). In `Settings > About phone` it shows that there are no updates to the firmware.How should I update my device? It is not a popular phone and I cannot find an updated ROM for it.If it matters, the phone has a 500 MHz CPU, 200 MB RAM with 250 MB ROM.  [1]: http://www.qmobile.com.pk/71/A100.html
